content: WINE LAB.Search this siteEmbedded FilesSkip to main contentSkip to navigationWireless Intelligence at Network Edge LaboratoryResearch areasHello!We are Wireless Intelligence at Network Edge Laboratory belonging to Professor Hwangnam Kim of the Department of Electrical Engineering at Korea University. We are actively conducting various up-to-date research in line with the trend. If you're interested, come with us!Research areasDrone system optimization & Anti-Drone system Cyber Physical System &Protocol Optimization Internet of Things &Network virtualization Machine Learning,Deep Learning, Reinforcement Learning Indoor, Outdoor Localization Blockchain& Decentralized Platform Google SitesReport abusePage detailsPage updated Google SitesReport abuse
